title: Like Night and Day
description: Rae is outgoing and confident. Simon is quiet and shy. Through a shared interest in outer space, the two become unlikely friends, but can their friendship last? Like Night and Day is an entertaining story about how similarities but also differences can help build lasting friendships. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast characters as well as identify syllable patterns.
